raw_comment: I notice that the different countries have varying usage rates in regards to what energy sources they use. I wonder whether the trend toward cleaner energy sources will continue at this rate or whether there will be changes in the near future. This impacts my community since a change to cleaner power sources would benefit the environment. However, it depends whether we would be able to maintain it in a way that is sustainable. Otherwise we would struggle as a result. A catchy or fitting headline would be “The progress in Energy around the world”
ace_sentences: Different countries have different usage rates of energy sources.
I wonder whether the trend toward cleaner energy sources will continue at this rate.
I wonder whether the trend toward cleaner energy sources will change in the near future.
A change to cleaner power sources would benefit the environment.
It depends on whether we can maintain cleaner power sources in a sustainable way.
If we cannot maintain cleaner power sources in a sustainable way then we will struggle.
The headline is: The progress in energy around the world.
